title: Log in user
name: Login
description: After logging a cookie is set and a session is maintained on the server. This API is build to work with aSPA. Therefore there's no server side redirect.

Parameter.description: Mandatory username. The same field can also contain an email address, but still has to be called 'username'.

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 401 Unauthorized

examples.title: Error-Response:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
set-cookie: connect.sid=s%3A0VMqqYBK3LGMKoKeeP8ntme0ZqT2rW95.2LmE%2BkYoa9khWbw7yBPJLHzxrF6b%2FDQhsraFNF%2FIvc8; Path=/; HttpOnly
   {
      "username": "MasterBrew",
      "id": "5d4d3bfc720fb89b71e013cf",
      "firstname": "Jurgen",
      "lastname": "Tonneyck",
      "email": "Jurgen.Tonneyck@ironhack.com",
   }

examples.title: Error-Response:
Success-Response:
examples.content: HTTP/1.1 205 Reset Content

title: Sign up user
name: Signup
description: After signing up the user is automatically logged in by setting a cookie and maintaining a session server side. This API is build to work with a SPA. Therefore there's no server side redirect.

Parameter.description: Mandatory email address of user. Has to be unique.
Mandatory. Minimum eight characters, at least one letter and one number.

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
set-cookie: connect.sid=s%3A0VMqqYBK3LGMKoKeeP8ntme0ZqT2rW95.2LmE%2BkYoa9khWbw7yBPJLHzxrF6b%2FDQhsraFNF%2FIvc8; Path=/; HttpOnly
   {
      "username": "MasterBrew",
      "id": "5d4d3bfc720fb89b71e013cf",
      "firstname": "Jurgen",
      "lastname": "Tonneyck",
      "email": "Jurgen.Tonneyck@ironhack.com",
   }

Parameter.description: Mandatory date of first brew of Beer. String in Date format: YYYY or YYYY-MM or YYYY-MM-DD.
Mandatory name of Beer. It has to be unique.
Optional. Picture has to be a png or jpg. If provided, set mimetype to multipart/form-data. If not provided, the default picture will be "https://images.punkapi.com/v2/2.png".

examples.title: Error-Response:
Error-Response:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
{
   "image_url": "https://images.punkapi.com/v2/2.png",
   "_id": "5d4d3bfc720fb89b71e013cf",
   "name": "Trashy Blonde",
   "tagline": "You Know You Shouldn't",
   "first_brewed": "04/2008",
   "description": "A titillating, neurotic, peroxide punk of a Pale Ale. Combining attitude, style, substance, and a little bit of low self esteem for good measure; what would your mother say? The seductive lure of the sassy passion fruit hop proves too much to resist. All that is even before we get onto the fact that there are no additives, preservatives, pasteurization or strings attached. All wrapped up with the customary BrewDog bite and imaginative twist.",
   "attenuation_level": 76,
}

examples.title: Success-Response:
Error-Response:
Success-Response:
